antispam.desc: Manage antispam protection with configurable levels
antispam.disabled_status:
๐ *Antispam Status*

๐ด Disabled

Use `antispam on` to enable protection

โ๏ธ *Antispam Protection Disabled*

Spam detection is now OFF
antispam.invalid_level: โ Invalid level. Use: low, medium, high
antispam.help:
๐ *Antispam Help*

*Commands:*
โข `antispam on` - Enable (default: medium)
โข `antispam off` - Disable
โข `antispam <low/medium/high>` - Change sensitivity
โข `antispam <warn/delete/kick>` - Change action
โข `antispam info` - View current settings

*Levels:*
โข Low - Relaxed (active groups)
โข Medium - Balanced (recommended)
โข High - Strict (problem groups)

*ุฏููู ุฅุนุฏุงุฏ ูุตุงุฏูุฉ Google:*

1. *ุฅูุดุงุก ูุดุฑูุน:* ุงูุชูู ุฅูู https://console.cloud.google.com/ุ ูุงููุฑ ููู "Select a project" > "New Project"ุ ููู ุจุชุณููุชู "Levanter" ูุงููุฑ ููู "Create".

3. *ุดุงุดุฉ ููุงููุฉ OAuth:* ุงูุชูู ุฅูู "APIs & Services" > "OAuth consent screen". ุงุฎุชุฑ "External"ุ ูุงููุฃ ุงูุญููู ุงููุทููุจุฉุ ููู ูุณู "Audience"ุ ุฃุถู ุจุฑูุฏู ุงูุฅููุชุฑููู ุฅูู "Test users" (ุฅูุฒุงูู).
4. *ุจูุงูุงุช ุงูุงุนุชูุงุฏ:* ุงูุชูู ุฅูู "APIs & Services" > "Credentials". ุงููุฑ ููู "Create Credentials" > "OAuth client ID". ุญุฏุฏ "Desktop app" ูููุงุน ุงูุชุทุจููุ ููู ุจุชุณููุชูุ ูุงููุฑ ููู "Create".
5. *ุชูุฒูู:* ุจุฌุงูุจ ูุนุฑู ุงูุนููู ุงูุฌุฏูุฏุ ุงููุฑ ููู ุฃููููุฉ ุงูุชูุฒูู (JSON). ุงุญูุธู ูุงุณุชุฎุฏู `.gauth import` ุจุงูุฑุฏ ุนูู ุงูููู.
6. *ุงูุชูููุถ:* ุงูุขู ุงููุฑ ููู ุงูุฑุงุจุท ุฃุฏูุงู ููุชูููุถ:

7. *ุฅููุงู:* ูู ุจุชุณุฌูู ุงูุฏุฎููุ ูุงูุจู ุชุญุฐูุฑ "Unverified app" (ุงููุฑ ููู "Advanced" > "Go to Levanter")ุ ูุงูุณุฎ ุนููุงู URL ุงููุงูู ูู ุดุฑูุท ุงูุนููุงู ุจุนุฏ ุฅุนุงุฏุฉ ุงูุชูุฌููุ ูุฃุฑุณู:
